title: (正視聽)係中國違反聯合聲明，唔係中英聯合聲明失效

replies.msg:
見到隔離ＰＯＳＴ係咁話要登報話中英聯合聲明失效，有冇搞錯
如果中英聯合聲明失效英國點會有責任去幫香港
一路都係講緊中國違反聯合聲明，所以英國係有責任追數，包括ＢＮＯ平權，甚至收返香港
有乜理由跟足大陸口吻話聲明無效，真係火都黎


講開又講，要追數仲有其他可以追，我唔明宜家追ＢＮＯ問題有乜用
一來幫唔到香港
二來幫唔到班學生不但止，反而分分鐘益左
ＢＮＯ只不過係最後撒離香港既下下策

雖然預左冇人睇
不過我都draft 左份

1. The recent statement from CCP regarding the Joint Sino-Birtish Declaration have shown the CCP has no intentions to fulfill their obligations since the turnover of Hong Kong
2. The controversal events in the recent years the CCP did on HK should not be seem as individual events or accidents, but a series of carefully planned strategical moves to erode HK's autonomy in all aspects, including but not limited to
 - The kidnapping of the bookstore owner and business man as a move to cross-border law enforcement
 - The increasing influence of LOCPG on the governement and councilor decision and policy making
 - The disqualifiation of candidates and members of the legislative council from pro-democracy parties 
 - The contradiction bill to bridge the legal system on mainland China to HK

3. Therefore we believe the "One Country, Two Systems" is indeed under active attacks from China to breach the protections brought by the Joint Sino-British Declaration and the Basic Law

4. Hereby we urge the UK government to re-evaulate the status of HK autonomy and take necessary measures to restore it.

5. If these measures failed, based on humanity reasons, we wish the UK and the western world would rescue the liberals in HK


首先要承認香港自治受威脅
呢個唔係一朝一夕既事
而英國上年都仲係出報告話冇事
好啦,宜家自打嘴巴都要有個講法
咁可以話之前各種事件當左獨立事件去睇
但宜家中國擺明當聲明冇到, 之後再將一直以來發生既事拉埋一齊睇就好大事

講就講咁多野
咪以為英國班政治佬睇唔到,
人地受既政治磨練高過香港既唔知幾多班, 唔係又點會隨便點個人做港督都做得咁好
人地唔係剩係聽你把口講, 睇你點寫
係睇你個action

所以你登報又盛,講咁多野
都唔及掛張港英旗同英國旗係立法會咁大影響
